author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IGM Financial Announces April 2018 Investment Fund Sales And Total Assets Under Management
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - IGM Financial Inc:
* IGM FINANCIAL INC. ANNOUNCES APRIL 2018 INVESTMENT FUND SALES AND TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT
* IGM FINANCIAL INC - TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WERE $156.3 BILLION AT APRIL 30, 2018, COMPARED WITH $155.8 BILLION AT MARCH 31, 2018
* IGM FINANCIAL INC - INVESTMENT FUND ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WERE $149.7 BILLION AT APRIL 30, 2018, COMPARED WITH $149.2 BILLION AT MARCH 31, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
